title: Professional and Business Branding Talk
description: Shine for Christ in your career and build a purpose-driven brand that reflects excellence. Don’t miss this chance to grow and glow!

title: Praise Night
description: A powerful night of worship, dance, and thanksgiving to God. Come ready to praise—bring your friends along!

title: Diving Deep into the Word of God
description: A day filled with blessings, from diving deep and explaining the mysteries in the word of God to having a personal time with God. You really don't want to miss this!

title: Thanksgiving Sunday
description: Celebrate God’s faithfulness and goodness throughout the year. Come with your joy, your praise, and your friends!
